semantic_identifier: [GOLD-187]: issue_clustering v2: Add per-product-area clustering configuration + model selection
title: issue_clustering v2: Add per-product-area clustering configuration + model selection

sections.text: Introduce a product-area–scoped configuration layer for issue_clustering v2 so clustering can be tuned per area (e.g., embedding model/version, similarity threshold, min cluster size) without affecting global behavior. Route incoming issues to the correct config based on the linked product area and persist the config snapshot used for each clustering decision for auditability. Add guardrails/fallbacks to the default config when product area is missing or misclassified.
